price: Baravuga bati “Ahubwo tukuzaniye ibyo bajyaga bashidikanyaho (ibihano).”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
